name: Coup Media
description:
Coup Media marketing technology agency which organises and hosts The Online Influence Conference, Europe's fastest growing tech gathering (2500 delegates and counting)!
We work with national and global brands including Google, Twitter, Oracle, Microsoft, IBM, Airbnb, BuzzFeed, Amnesty International, World Wildlife Fund (WWF), BBC Film, The National Trust, Tourism Malaysia, NHS, The AA, Del Monte, Lloyds Banking Group and many more.
We are uniquely placed at the intersection of agency and events, meaning we're curating content and knowledge from the World's leading companies, and repurposing that content through our own publishing channels, or deploying it within client strategies.
READ MORE...
